victim.name: Officer Marcus Kane
victim.location: Police transport van outside Westfield Hospital

client.name: Eddie Torres
client.charges: First-degree murder of Officer Marcus Kane
why_appears_guilty: Was being transported by victim when murder occurred
Had history of violent altercations with prison guards
His blood found on murder weapon
Multiple witnesses saw him flee scene
why_actually_innocent: Was unconscious from drugs during actual murder
Blood was planted on weapon by real killer
Victim was trying to help expose prison abuse

real_killer.name: Captain Derek Walsh
real_killer.true_motive: Officer Kane discovered Walsh's systematic abuse and trafficking ring in juvenile detention
why_not_suspected: Was supposedly coordinating search when murder occurred
Appears to be advocating for justice for fallen officer

victory_conditions.prove_client_innocent: Show Eddie was unconscious and framed
victory_conditions.expose_real_killer: Reveal Captain Walsh's abuse ring and cover-up
victory_conditions.explain_conspiracy: Demonstrate how institutional corruption silenced Officer Kane
